thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PLUS Delmere Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very good place to stay in central London
thread.title_full: Very good place to stay in central London - Review of BEST WESTERN PLUS Delmere Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: KBY23
title: Very good place to stay in central London
text: I really like this hotel as a go-to stop for weekend trips to London. The rooms are clean, comfortable, modern and quiet. The location is convenient to Paddington Station and Hyde Park. It is a really good value - especially if you can book last minute deals! The rooms are small, but it's central London, so that's expected. I did not have breakfast there, so can't speak to that, but the breakfast room looks perfectly pleasant. The staff were really nice and welcoming.
